title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated cheeses together with plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving a cup of cooking water.
Working quickly, add hot pasta to the pancetta, then remove from heat.
Add egg mixture, tossing quickly to create a creamy sauce. Add pasta water if needed.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, garam masala, and ginger-garlic paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through.
